course_description: Ethics is integral to the everyday practice of medicine. Our integrated ethics curriculum is designed to provide the knowledge and skills to analyze and address ethical issues commonly encountered in clinical practice. Throughout the 4 years, ethics lectures, small group discussions, embedded clinical rotation sessions, case analyses, and creative encounters help students develop critical thinking skills and provide foundational concepts and decision-making frameworks in medical ethics.
